segments.text: Welcome to our company Mr white . My name is Yan Hua , the secretary of Mr Wang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to have a cup of tea or coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'd like Chinese tea very much !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Glad you like it . By the way , is this your first time to China , Mr . White ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , as a representative of IBM . I hope to conclude some business with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also hope to expand our business with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you probably know China has adopted a flexible policy in her foreign trade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have read about it , but I would like to know more about it .
segments.speaker: S2
